name: Ashwagandha
summary: Adaptogenic herb that supports stress resilience and promotes calm energy balance.
side_effects: stomach upset if taken without food

name: Rhodiola rosea
summary: Arctic adaptogen known for supporting energy levels and mental performance under stress.

name: Bacopa monnieri
summary: Traditional Ayurvedic herb that supports memory formation and cognitive function.

name: Lion's Mane Mushroom
summary: Functional mushroom that supports cognitive health and nerve growth factors.

name: Ginkgo biloba
summary: Ancient tree extract traditionally used to support circulation and cognitive function.
bioavailability: standardized to flavone glycosides and terpene lactones

name: Panax ginseng
summary: Traditional adaptogenic root that supports energy levels and cognitive performance.

name: American ginseng
summary: Milder adaptogenic root that supports balanced energy and stress response.

name: Gotu Kola
summary: Traditional herb that supports circulation, skin health, and cognitive function.

name: L-Theanine
summary: Amino acid from tea leaves that promotes calm focus without drowsiness.

name: Caffeine Anhydrous
summary: Pure caffeine that supports alertness, focus, and physical performance.
cycle: cycle off periodically to prevent tolerance

name: Magnesium Glycinate
summary: Highly bioavailable form of magnesium that supports muscle and nerve function.

name: Vitamin D3
summary: Essential vitamin that supports bone health and immune function.
bioavailability: fat-soluble, take with meals containing fats

name: Omega-3 Fish Oil
summary: Essential fatty acids that support heart health and cognitive function.
bioavailability: triglyceride form preferred over ethyl ester

name: CoQ10
summary: Antioxidant that supports cellular energy production and heart health.
bioavailability: ubiquinol form more bioavailable than ubiquinone

name: Probiotics
summary: Beneficial bacteria that support digestive health and immune function.
bioavailability: enteric coating protects from stomach acid

name: Turmeric Curcumin
summary: Anti-inflammatory compound from turmeric root that supports joint health.

name: Green Tea Extract
summary: Antioxidant-rich extract that supports metabolism and provides gentle energy.

name: Spirulina
summary: Nutrient-dense blue-green algae that provides protein and antioxidants.

name: Chlorella
summary: Green algae rich in chlorophyll that supports detoxification and nutrition.
bioavailability: broken cell wall for better absorption

name: Maca Root
summary: Peruvian root vegetable that supports energy and hormonal balance.

name: Holy Basil
summary: Sacred herb that supports stress resilience and promotes calm.

name: Reishi Mushroom
summary: Adaptogenic mushroom known as the mushroom of immortality for wellness support.
bioavailability: dual extraction for water and alcohol soluble compounds

name: Cordyceps
summary: Performance mushroom that supports energy production and exercise capacity.

name: Elderberry
summary: Antioxidant-rich berry that supports immune function and seasonal wellness.

name: Echinacea
summary: Traditional immune-supporting herb used for seasonal wellness.
bioavailability: standardized to echinacoside and chicoric acid

name: Astragalus
summary: Traditional Chinese herb that supports immune function and vitality.

name: Milk Thistle
summary: Liver-supporting herb standardized to silymarin for hepatic wellness.

name: Dandelion Root
summary: Traditional herb that supports liver function and digestive wellness.

name: Saw Palmetto
summary: Traditional herb that supports men's prostate and urinary health.
bioavailability: standardized to fatty acids and sterols

name: Cranberry Extract
summary: Antioxidant-rich berry extract that supports urinary tract health.

name: Valerian Root
summary: Traditional herb that promotes relaxation and supports sleep quality.
benefits: May reduce time to fall asleep

name: Passionflower
summary: Calming herb that supports relaxation and may help with occasional anxiety.

name: Lemon Balm
summary: Gentle herb from the mint family that promotes calm and supports sleep.

name: Chamomile
summary: Gentle flower that promotes relaxation and supports digestive comfort.

name: Ginger Root
summary: Warming spice that supports digestive comfort and healthy inflammation response.

name: Peppermint Oil
summary: Essential oil that supports digestive comfort and respiratory wellness.

name: Garlic Extract
summary: Cardiovascular-supporting herb standardized to allicin compounds.

name: Hawthorn Berry
summary: Traditional heart herb that supports cardiovascular function and circulation.

name: Grape Seed Extract
summary: Antioxidant-rich extract that supports circulation and vascular health.

name: Resveratrol
summary: Antioxidant compound found in grapes that supports healthy aging and longevity.

name: Quercetin
summary: Flavonoid antioxidant that supports immune function and healthy inflammation response.

name: Bromelain
summary: Pineapple-derived enzyme that supports protein digestion and healthy inflammation response.
timing: with meals for digestion, between meals for inflammation
bioavailability: measured in GDU or MCU activity units

name: Digestive Enzymes
summary: Comprehensive enzyme blend that supports the digestion of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates.
benefits: Supports protein, fat, and carb digestion
bioavailability: enteric coating protects enzymes from stomach acid

name: Alpha Lipoic Acid
summary: Universal antioxidant that supports cellular energy and glucose metabolism.

name: Acetyl-L-Carnitine
summary: Amino acid derivative that supports brain function and cellular energy metabolism.

name: L-Tyrosine
summary: Amino acid precursor to neurotransmitters that supports focus and stress resilience.

name: Taurine
summary: Amino acid that supports cardiovascular function and cellular hydration.
bioavailability: well absorbed with or without food

name: Glycine
summary: Simple amino acid that supports sleep quality and collagen synthesis.

name: Creatine Monohydrate
summary: Well-researched compound that supports muscle energy and exercise performance.

name: Beta-Alanine
summary: Amino acid that supports muscular endurance and reduces exercise fatigue.
